bug.author: mockdone
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: [A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] V 1.0 2020-02-19 03:44:27,160 | kubeflow_jupyter.common.auth | WARNING | No user credentials were found! Make sure you have correctly set the USERID_HEADER in the Jupyter Web App's deployment. 10.16.1.65 - - [19/Feb/2020 03:44:27] "GET /api/namespaces/mytest/notebooks HTTP/1.1" 200 - <denchmark-link:http://10.18.5.30/jupyter/api/namespaces/mytest/notebooks>http://10.18.5.30/jupyter/api/namespaces/mytest/notebooks</denchmark-link>
get: {log: "User None is not authorized to list kubeflow.org.v1beta1.notebooks for namespace: mytest",…} What did you expect to happen: Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Kubeflow version: v1beta1: kfctl version: v1.0-rc.3-1-g24b60e8: Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) Kubernetes version: 1.14: OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):centos
